honors_and_awards.title: Jewels of KGP
honors_and_awards.description: 'Jewels of KGP' is awarded to IIT Kharagpur community who are performing extraordinarily in their field of interest.

honors_and_awards.title: IIT Kgp Illumination 2022
honors_and_awards.description: Secured a historic second-place podium finish and served as the Illumination Captain of MMM Hall of Residence at IIT Kharagpur.

honors_and_awards.title: Best Council Member
honors_and_awards.publication: President of Students Society of Architects and Planners, ARP, IIT Kharagpur
